content:
== Follow the steps below to pull the codebase for Project 2:

 1. run `git remote -v` to check your remotes, initially, you should have your own team's remote, like this
{{{
    origin	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19-team-0 (fetch)
    origin	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19-team-0 (push)
}}}

 2.  run `git remote add source https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19` to add the template codebase as `source` remote

 3. run `git remote -v` to check your remotes, now, you should have one more pair of source remote, like this
{{{
    origin	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19-team-0 (fetch)
    origin	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19-team-0 (push)
    source	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19 (fetch)
    source	https://github.com/UCI-Chenli-teaching/cs222-fall19 (push)
}}}

 4. run `git fetch source master` to fetch the source's master, you should see
{{{
    Branch 'source-master' set up to track remote branch 'master' from 'source'.
    Switched to a new branch 'source-master'
}}}

 5. run `git checkout master` to switch back to your own master branch (origin/master)

 6. At your own master (origin/master), run `git cherry-pick 112cfb` to apply the source codebase to your master branch.
{{{
[master 5688a17] Project 2
 Date: Mon Oct 7 20:57:13 2019 -0700
 29 files changed, 2098 insertions(+), 25 deletions(-)
 rewrite README.md (62%)
 create mode 100755 project2_report.txt
 create mode 100644 rbf/rbftest_update.cc
 create mode 100644 rbf/rbftest_delete.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/makefile
 create mode 100755 rm/rm.cc
 create mode 100755 rm/rm.h
 create mode 100644 rm/rm_test_util.h
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_00.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_01.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_02.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_03.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_04.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_05.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_06.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_07.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_08.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_09.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_10.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_11.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_12.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_13.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_13b.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_14.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_15.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_create_tables.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_delete_tables.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_extra_1.cc
 create mode 100644 rm/rmtest_extra_2.cc
}}}

Then you can start coding.
